page.title: 05Television
page.content: The percentage of people that have a {colour T.V}is 87%, and the percentage that don't is 13%. I have also found the percentage of {video}ownership. Only 19% had videos and 81% didn't. My family enjoy watching T.V especially me. I like watching {American}stories like Miami Vice, Dallas, Dynasty and Knots Landing. I like "Carry On "films and some British programmes.I think it is good to have childrens programmes because the soap operas are on too late.I do not like violent things like murders. My dad likes me watching T.V because somethings are interesting.I think T.V is great,it stops you from being bored. If you want to know what is on T.V you can look in the{newspaper. There are 4{channels}BBC1 BBC2 Central and Channel 4.
